abstract: Minnesota Twins sign South Korean first baseman Byung Ho Park to four-year, $12 million contract; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The South Korean first baseman Byung Ho Park agreed to a $12 million, four-year contract with Minnesota.

headline.main: Korean Player Agrees on Deal With Twins

snippet: The South Korean first baseman Byung Ho Park agreed to a $12 million, four-year contract with Minnesota.
